name: Summer Daydream
description:
While attending an old friend's funeral, someone catches your eye. At the same time, you're curious as to how your friend met her untimely demise.

*Warning: Contains mentions of suicide, death, and mild blood.

**This was made in a few days so the quality isn't top-notch. I hope you enjoy it nonetheless. I tried my hand at composing music, mainly involving the piano to create ambience. It's pretty repetitive, but it's a start. Check the "READ ME" file for more details.
